front.title: Label Switched Path (LSP) Ping/Trace Multipath Support for Link Aggregation Group (LAG) Interfaces

abstract.t: This document defines an extension to the MPLS Label Switched Path (LSP) Ping and Traceroute as specified in RFC 8029. The extension allows the MPLS LSP Ping and Traceroute to discover and exercise specific paths of Layer 2 (L2) Equal-Cost Multipath (ECMP) over Link Aggregation Group (LAG) interfaces. This document updates RFC8029.
